key.name: enable-spellchecking
key.description: If true, misspellings will be underlined in red, and correct spelling suggestions shown in the right-click menu.

key.name: enable-auto-links
key.description: Enable this option to automatically create a link, when text matches note title.

key.name: enable-url-links
key.summary: Create links for URLs in notes
key.description: Enable this option to create links for URLs in notes.

key.name: enable-wikiwords
key.description: Enable this option to highlight words ThatLookLikeThis. Clicking the word will create a note with that name.

key.name: enable-bulleted-lists
key.description: Enable this option if you want bulleted lists to be automatic when you place - or * at the beginning of a line.

key.name: enable-icon-paste
key.description: Enable this option if you want to be able to middle-click the Gnote icon to paste timestamped content into the Start Here note.

key.name: enable-custom-font
key.description: If true, the font name set in custom-font-face will be used as the font when displaying notes. Otherwise the desktop default font will be used.

key.name: custom-font-face
key.description: If enable-custom-font is true, the font name set here will be used as the font when displaying notes.

key.name: highlight-background-color
key.summary: Background color for the highlighted text
key.description: When text is highlighted, use this color for background. A string gdk_rgba_parse() accepts.

key.name: highlight-foreground-color
key.description: When text is highlighted, use this color for text. A string gdk_rgba_parse() accepts.

key.name: start-note
key.description: The note URI of the note that should be considered the "Start Here" note, which is always placed at the bottom of the Gnote note menu and also accessible by hotkey.

key.name: menu-note-count
key.summary: Minimum number of notes to show in menu
key.description: Integer determining the minimum number of notes to show in the Gnote note menu.

key.name: menu-pinned-notes
key.description: Whitespace-separated list of note URIs for notes that should always appear in the Gnote note menu.

key.name: main-window-maximized
key.description: If true, Gnote window will be maximized.

key.name: search-window-height
key.description: Determines pixel height of Search window; stored on Gnote exit.

key.name: search-window-width
key.description: Determines pixel width of Search window; stored on Gnote exit.

key.name: search-window-splitter-pos
key.summary: Saved splitter position of Search window splitter.
key.description: Determines Search window splitter position in pixels; stored on Gnote exit.

key.name: search-sorting
key.summary: Saved sorting of the Search window.
key.description: Determines Search window initial sorting.

key.name: sync-fuse-mount-timeout-ms
key.description: Time (in milliseconds) Gnote should wait for a response when using FUSE to mount a sync share.

key.name: sync-sshfs-folder
key.description: Path on SSH server to Gnote synchronization directory (optional).

key.name: sync-sshfs-server
key.description: URL of SSH server containing Gnote synchronization directory.

key.name: sync-sshfs-username
key.description: User name to use when connecting to the synchronization server via SSH.

key.name: sync-sshfs-port
key.description: The port to use when connecting to the synchronization server via SSH.

key.name: note-rename-behavior
key.summary: Link Updating Behavior on Note Rename
key.description: Integer value indicating if there is a preference to always perform a specific link updating behavior when a note is renamed, instead of prompting the user. The values map to an internal enumeration. 0 indicates that the user wishes to be prompted when renaming a note may impact links that exist in other notes. 1 indicates that links should automatically be removed. 2 indicates that link text should be updated to the new note name so that it will continue linking to the renamed note.

key.name: enable-close-note-on-escape
key.description: This key is deprecated and its value is ignored.

key.name: use-status-icon
key.summary: Use status icon, when started as an application
key.description: Deprecated, has no effect.

key.name: open-notes-in-new-window
key.description: This setting is deprecated and its value is ignored

key.name: autosize-note-window
key.description: This key is deprecated and its value is ignored.

key.name: use-client-side-decorations
key.description: Should Gnote draw its window titlebar, or leave that to window manager. Possible values are 'enabled' to draw them, 'disabled' to leave them to window manager, or a comma separated list of desktop environments, where Gnote should draw decorations itself. Requires application restart.

key.name: color-scheme
key.description: The theme variant to use. Possible values are empty string to follow the system, 'dark' and 'light'.

key.name: last-directory
key.description: The last directory a note was exported to using the Export To HTML plugin.

key.name: export-linked
key.description: The last setting for the 'Export linked notes' checkbox in the Export to HTML plugin.

key.name: export-linked-all
key.description: The last setting for the 'Include all other linked notes' checkbox in the Export to HTML plugin. This setting is used in conjunction with the 'HTML Export Linked Notes' setting and is used to specify whether all notes (found recursively) should be included during an export to HTML.

key.name: sync-guid
key.description: Unique identifier for this Gnote client, used when communicating with a synchronization server.

key.name: sync-local-path
key.description: Path to the synchronization server when using the filesystem synchronization service addin.

key.name: sync-selected-service-addin
key.description: Unique identifier for the currently configured note synchronization service addin.

key.name: sync-conflict-behavior
key.description: Integer value indicating if there is a preference to always perform a specific behavior when a conflict is detected, instead of prompting the user. The values map to an internal enumeration. 0 indicates that the user wishes to be prompted when a conflict occurs, so that they may handle each conflict situation on a case-by-case basis.

key.name: autosync-timeout
key.description: Integer value indicating how frequently to perform a background sync of your notes (when sync is configured). Any value less than 1 indicates that autosync is disabled. The lowest acceptable positive value is 5. Value is in minutes.

key.name: uri
key.description: URI to online directory where notes are synchronized to.

key.name: accept-sslcert
key.description: Use wdfs option "-ac" to accept SSL certificates without prompting the user.

key.name: url
key.description: WebDAV share URL where notes are synchronized to.

key.name: username
key.description: Username to access WebDAV share.

key.name: format
key.description: The date format that is used for the timestamp. It follows the format of strftime(3).

key.name: check-interval
key.description: Time interval between note directory checks (in seconds). Min value is 5.
